item.title: Proton Mail Review (2025): The Email Service You Didn’t Know You Needed
item.description: Proton Mail gives you encrypted email, but more importantly, it puts you in the driver’s seat of your inbox.

item.title: Browser Fingerprinting: What Your Browser Is Telling Everyone About You
item.description: Your browser sends a lot of information with each website you visit. That can be used to track you across the internet.

item.title: Spit On, Sworn At, and Undeterred: What It’s Like to Own a Cybertruck
item.description: “We were the targets.” WIRED spoke to seven Tesla Cybertruck owners about their most controversial purchase and why they're proud to drive it.

item.title: Best Gifts for Babies and Toddlers, Tested and Approved by Our Own Kids
item.description: Shopping for tiny people is intimidating. Good news: We did it for you.

item.title: The AI Industry’s Scaling Obsession Is Headed for a Cliff
item.description: Huge AI infrastructure deals assume that algorithms will keep improving with scale. They may not.
